name: Alexandre Sepulveda De Dietrich
headline: Data Scientist and Business Analytics MS candidate
about: I build reliable analytics and machine learning systems that help teams make confident decisions. My focus includes anomaly detection, time series analysis, and data quality work for finance and commercial teams.

experience.role: Data Scientist Intern, Advanced Analytics and Data Science
highlights: Built an accounting data quality and anomaly detection pipeline.
Developed mixed data detection workflows and experiment tracking.
Collaborated with finance stakeholders on deployment needs.

experience.role: Data Analyst Intern, Commercial Excellence Europe
highlights: Analyzed reseller performance across multiple markets.
Created dashboards for negotiation teams with standardized KPIs.
Enabled consistent reporting for account strategy planning.

experience.role: Research Project, Sensor Fusion Vehicle Tracking
highlights: Built a camera and ranging sensor fusion pipeline.
Validated tracking accuracy in a controlled test area.
Shared findings with academic and industry partners.

details: Coursework: AI Engineering, Marketing Analytics, Business Analytics, Data Analytics, Probability Statistics and Simulation

education.degree: Diplome d'Ingenieur (MEng) in Mathematics and Data Science
details: Coursework: Algorithms and Networks, Machine Learning, HPC and Cloud Computing, Signal Processing, Game Theory

education.degree: Intensive Preparatory Course in Physics and Engineering
details: Ranked top 2 percent of national competitive entrance exams
Two to three year intensive program preparing for France's top engineering schools
